alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 7:30PM CDT until July 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHERRY AND NORTHEASTERN GRANT COUNTIES... At 629 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles north of Whitman, or 31 miles northwest of Mullen, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Whitman, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Round Lake, Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road and Hire. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 157 and 160. Highway 61 between mile markers 180 and 184. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
